about_the_game:
Glass2 Official Artbook: Behind the scenes of creation

Dive deeper into the world of Glass2, the game that captured your heart. This official art book is more than just a collection of artwork,
it's a behind-the-scenes look at the journey that brought the game to life. From early rough sketches to high-resolution images,
and directed animations, this art book showcases every moment of the creative process with invaluable resources.

Key Features:
Early rough sketches: See how the ideas for Glass2 came to visual form.
Experience the creativity that shines through the imperfections of those early days.

High-resolution artwork: High-resolution images of the beautiful scenes you'll see in-game.
Beyond the digital screen, you can see every detail of each scene.

Directed animations: Includes directed animations that enhance the immersive experience of the game,
This art book shares the storytelling and world-building secrets of Glass2.
